content: That's a great list, thanks! I think I'll try the Rooibos Chai and the Lemon Ginger Zinger. I've been looking for something to spice up my morning routine, and these sound perfect. By the way, speaking of morning routines, I've been trying to cut down on caffeine, so I've switched to decaf tea, except for Fridays when I treat myself to a latte from that new coffee shop downtown.
